channel.title: AlternativePk 718!
channel.description:
[center][B]AlternativePk is the best 718 pking server you can find around. We've been online for over a year now and don't plan on going down anytime soon! We've never had an economy reset and we have a very nice and moderately sized community looking to expand a bit more. There's plenty of unique content on our server for you to enjoy![/B]
[img]http://i61.tinypic.com/13z8guw.png[/img][url=http://alternativepk.net/]AlternativePk - #1 718 Rsps[/url] [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/s277ex.png[/img][url=http://alternativepk.net/forums/]AlternativePk Forums[/url] [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/104izar.png[/img][URL=http://"http://alternativepk.net/AlternativePkClientv1.5.jar"]http://alternativepk.net/AlternativePkClientv1.5.jar[/URL]
[img]http://i61.tinypic.com/2guihkp.png[/img] [spoiler=Pictures] [B]~Weapon Prestige Mini-Game~[/B] AlternativePk has a uniquely custom coded MiniGame! Join weapon prestige and kill others to upgrade your weapon! The more kills you get, the better the weapon you'll receive! The top 3 winners receive Wp Points to spend in the rewards shop used to upgrade certain weapons outside the minigame! [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/wtvtoz.png[/img]
[B]~Upgrade-able Weapons~[/B] Use your Wp Points to upgrade the following weapons for a -20% special cost, better stats, and a better looking special!
[B]~Upgraded Dragon claws~[/B] [img]https://i.imgflip.com/b2975.gif[/img]
[B]~Upgraded Korasi~[/B] [img]https://i.imgflip.com/b297j.gif[/img]
[B]~Upgraded Armadyl Godsword~[/B] [img]https://i.imgflip.com/b2954.gif[/img]
[B]~Upgraded Bandos Godsword~[/B] [img]https://i.imgflip.com/b296c.gif[/img]
[B]~Upgraded Saradomin Godsword~[/B] [img]https://i.imgflip.com/b2994.gif[/img]
[B]~Upgraded Zamorak Godsword~[/B] [img]https://i.imgflip.com/b297p.gif[/img]
[B]~Grand Exchange Fully Player Based~[/B] Buy or sell your items on this fully functional player based Grand Exchange! [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/24dneaq.png[/img]
[B]~Clan System with Ranks/Capes/Banners~[/B] Create a clan with your friends an promote them with higher ranks depending on how you see fit. You can also buy a clan cape and motif that you can customize to your clans banner! [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/264tavb.png[/img] [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/2i6pate.png[/img] [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/dnom6u.png[/img]
[B]~Full Construction Player Owned Houses~[/B] Create your own house and design it depending on your Construction level! All objects and floors working! [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/30llb0w.png[/img]
[B]~Player Owned Shops~[/B] Put your items up for sell in your personal shop pricing it however you like! AlternativePks uniquely custom coded player owned shops will save you time waiting for items to sell on the Grand Exchange! You can search other items or other players specific shops at the PoS npc location. Higher ranked donors have more slots! Default is 3. When your item is sold you are alerted if you're logged in or the next time you log in! [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/2eo9ser.png[/img]
[B] ⋆Brutal Longsword⋆[/B] AlternativePks first custom PvM Weapon! You'll need a certain amount of each boss kills to have access to this weapon. It's untradeable and isn't useable in player vs player combat. It's special uses 100% energy and hits 5 specs, gives the overload effect and heals the player to full! [img]https://i.imgflip.com/b63sp.gif[/img]
[B] ⋆Brutal Whip⋆[/B] AlternativePks also contains the Brutal Whip! You'll need to collect idols from bosses around the server which have a certain percentage to drop. It's tradeable and is usable in player vs player combat. It's special uses 100% energy and hits 4 specs and stronger than any other whip in the game! [img]http://i.imgur.com/8aAK3Ln.png[/img]
[B]⋆Highscores⋆[/B] Highscores with prestige level, kills, and clan name! [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2evvp5d.png[/img]
[B]~Toolbelt~[/B] Fully working toolbelt with storing making it easier to skill! [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/2wefouo.png[/img]
[B]~Teleporter~[/B] Easy teleportation system making it easy to find your way around the server! [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/14ugz1v.png[/img] [/spoiler]
Content Pics Continued: [Spoiler=More Pics] [B]~Money Pouch~[/B] Money pouch is fully functional and works correctly with all shops!
[B]~Squeal of Fortune~[/B] Fully working squeal of fortune with a correctly coded percentage system. Rare spins announce in yell too! [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/262vak6.png[/img]
[B]~Hourly Lottery~[/B] Try AlternativePks custom lottery for your chance at a gp jackpot! The lottery announces every 15 minutes and picks a winner every hour! Entry is only 5m and you can enter up to 5 times. 10% of the pot is taken out for taxes to help keep our economy stable. [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/bgwimd.png[/img]
[B]~Dwarf Cannon with Quest~[/B] AlternativePks first quest is here! Finish the Dwarf Cannon quest for access to the Dwarf Cannon for fast range xp. [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/1el0n9.png[/img] [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/nv1dvq.png[/img]
[B]~Hourly Boss Raids~[/B] Once every hour the Party Demon Boss and a couple minions raid home. Defend home by killing him for a chance at some rare loot! [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/nf9ef.png[/img]
[B]~FriendChat with Lootshare~[/B] Friendchat fully working with loothshare working! [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/11ui0z5.png[/img]
[B]~Gambler~[/B] Test your luck in other ways than the lottery with the gambler npc! Enter your option and the odds are yours! [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/r29es6.png[/img]
[B]~Bankpins~[/B] Bankpins fully working for your accounts safety! [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/vy33nr.png[/img]
[B]~Monthly vote rewards + Top Voter + Vote Shop~[/B] AlternativePks custom vote system rewards you for how much you vote monthly. Since our players support us so much we want to reward them for their support! Every month there's new rewards to be obtained! Every 5 times a player votes they are rewarded, the more votes the better! Also the top voter of each month is rewarded a $25 donation voucher to spend in our donation shop to their liking :) You also receive vote points each time you vote that you can spend in AlternativePks vote shop. You also get a mystery box for voting which gives you a chance at a random pk item!
You can now also earn 10 minutes of double drops for every site you vote on! [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/2u95w2h.png[/img] [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/2gt6gdj.png[/img]
[B]~Killstreaks + Killstreak points + Shop~[/B] AlternativePks custom killstreak system rewards players for killstreaks. The higher your killstreak, the better your reward! Every 5 kills announces the player and their killstreak number in global chat. Every 5 kills the player also receives a higher amount of KillStreak points they can spend in the KillStreak rewards shop which includes Drygores and AlternativePks custom Pk Master Cape! [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/2wd5x5x.png[/img]
[B]~Summoning Pouch Creation + Scroll Creation~[/B] Fully working pouch and scroll creation! [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/30ac6r4.png[/img]
[B]~Completionist Cape~[/B] There are many requirements for the completionist cape to ensure you don't get bored and have a goal to achieve on the server! [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/30xcv2h.png[/img]
[B]~AlternativePk Point System~[/B] AlternativePk has its own point system that you can spend in the shops below. You can earn them skilling or bossing! [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/r9ipma.png[/img]
[B]~Players online listing~[/B] You can view whose online and their current gamemode/level/rank/ and wealth just by typing ::players! [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2s86brn.png[/img]
[B]~In-game Stat Viewing~[/B] You can view anyones stats at any time by right clicking other players for the view stats option. Listed is their prestige, kills, deaths, loyalty points, combat level, hitpoints, and their skill levels! [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2n0n7o6.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[B]Additional Content without media yet:[/B] 200m xp capes! (120 capes) Wealth viewing! (Show off your wealth by typing ::wealth ::invwealth ::equipwealth to show off how much you're worth!) Rainbow Partyhat! (Obtain by merging all partyhats together with a christmas cracker!) Use multiple spins at once to use up your spins faster! (up to 1, 5, and 10 spins at once) Extra Rewards every 25 boss kills! Choose your own xp rate! (moderate (x100 | Heroic (x50) | Ethereal (x10) | IronMan (x50 & No trading/Shops) Mage/Range & Melee Tokhaar-kal capes! Boss pets!
[img]http://i61.tinypic.com/244xv6b.png[/img] [B]~Weapon Prestige~ ~Duel Arena~ ~Fight Pits~ ~Fight Caves~ ~Pest Control~ ~Jaad Waves & Kiln Waves~ ~Zombie Invasion~ ~Dominion Tower~ ~Castle Wars~[/B]
[img]http://i61.tinypic.com/2uh1wrk.png[/img] [B]~Hourly Boss Raids~ ~All Godwars Bosses & Nex~ ~King Black Dragon~ ~Queen Black Dragon~ ~Blink~ ~Barrelchest~ ~Avatar of Destruction+Creation~ ~Nomad~ ~Corporeal Beast~ ~Sunfreet~ ~Dagonnoths Lair~ ~Yk'Lagor~ ~(NEW!) Vorago!~[/B]
[spoiler=Bosses] [B]~Wilderness Sunfreet~[/B] Teleport to Sunfreet in the wilderness for chance at Drygores and bonus killstreak points! Beware though because anyone can catch you off gaurd at any time and kill you while you're distracted. Sunfreet also gaurds the crystal key chest so defeat Sunfreet before you can get your reward! [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/29n6nsy.png[/img]
[B]~(NEW VORAGO!)~[/B] Teleport to the new Vorago Boss for a chance at new Frostbite pk weapons! These weapons have a 10% chance of freezing your opponent while pking for 3-5 seconds, as well as a new frostbite spirit shield that prevents you from being frozen by 50%! [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/adkqk1.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[center] [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/2rhqvrl.png[/img] [spoiler=Pk Pics] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/2cerjgk.png[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/4p0f6.png[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/2vnj344.png[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/k4h83m.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[img]http://i61.tinypic.com/ajvtz5.png[/img] [video]http://www.youtube.com/watch~v=gwB13n3WWEw[/video] [video]https://www.youtube.com/watch~v=s-YElZKOETY[/video]
[B]Server Specs[/B] Bandwidth 4000GB/2TB 4 gigs of ddr2 Windows 7 Server 8.10 w/ xfc GUI 40 gig diskspace DDOS Protected
[img]http://www.speedtest.net/result/3008087933.png[/img] [/center]
Reserved for more content~ [/center][/center]

item.title: AlternativePk 718!
item.dc:creator: @pastaway pastaway
item.description:
@pastaway wrote:

Don’t forget to download the new client v1.33! It now has zooming option with shift while scrolling! Also all black screening in areas has been fixed along with client lag.

Here is a list of this months and last months updates~ I have been steady fixing every bug that exists in the server and added tons of new content for you all to enjoy

Server & Site Updates

Green = Most Recent Live Updates
Yellow = Next Restart
Red = Working On

September 2015

*Reset votes for new month
*Updated and tweaked vote rewards
*Reset highscores to remove inactive players off board + now save on logout
*Changed comp cape castle war and pest control win requirements to 1
*Gambler now announces current pot when clicked
*Fixed pk supply drop having non wearable arma legs in the drop
*100m tickets give you cash when clicked (for iron man)
*Added overlord image for overlord accounts on highscores
Changed top voters to top 10 voters
​Fixed spirit mosquito pouch making
*Can’t equip brutal longsword in clan wars safe/risk & wilderness. If you try to bring it in these areas you get teleported back
*Fixed clans not registering clan name correctly
*Corrected friend chat bugging out when some players make a fc and others couldn’t join
*Double vote time starts when opened vote scroll instead of when voting so players can choose their double drop time
*Doors at sunfreet send you home instead of construction portal
*Doors at sunfreet will not let you use them if you are teleblocked!
*Overload flasks now noteable
*Added Tradeable dicebag to donation page
*Chaotic crossbow now uses non (e) bolts too
*Added bakriminel bolts to random drop from vorago (x1.4) Damage special & Heals slightler less than ruby bolt special
*Fixed ranged strength bonus not adding
*Hold shift+scroll to zoom in/out! (Client v1.23)
*Fixed removing items from equipment bonus screen
*Can now clean grimy guam at level 1 herblore to start leveling herblore
*Buffed boss pet drops from 1% to 2%
*Players start with lvl 1 herblore not 3
*Ignored players don’t show up in yell now
*Fixed orb of oculus needing 6 charges to save location
*Added ::resetzoom to command list and added a few missing commands
*Added fungal flakes to ganodermic drops & fungal armour
*Added npc in ganodermic area to trade pieces for ganodermic armour/fungal armour/ and polypore staff
*Implemented a blackmark/warning system to handle with repeat rule offenders and weed out the shitheads
(Blackmarks are only given when staff uses a punish command on a player. e.g: player muted or jailed or banned for an hour)
4 Blackmarks - 24 hour ban
7 Blackmarks - 48 hour ban
10 Blackmarks - Permban (Appeal on forums)
*Fixed the gaze into option on the Donor orb of oculus! (Great for taking neat apk screenshots
*Fixed dragonfire shields special
*Fixed certain primal armour ids not having correct item values
*Added colouring to brutal whips (red,green,yellow,blue, & purple!)
*Changed auto restarter to every 3 hours
*Added animations to candy cane and golden hammer
*Fixed shops checking if you have coins in your inventory to buy things. (Shops only take moneypouch gp!)
*Can’t open money tickets if you have too much gold in inventory
*Fixed gilded pickaxe not being able to mine rocks
*Can’t sell item to shop if you have too much gp in inv or money pouch
*Trade window shows correct item value of each item
*Organized updates thread into spoilers for faster scrolling~
*Moved home to edgeville
*Removed token exchange npc (added dialogue to token shop second click option!)
*Added boss kill rewards for 250, 500, 750 and 1k.
Rewards apk points, ks points, and sof spins at : 25, 50, 75, 100, 150, 200, 250, 500, 750, & 1,000 Boss kills for each boss! (more of each points at higher kills!)
Rewards dtds every 250 kills up to 1,000!
Rewards boss specific pet at 1,000 kills!
*Using dtd on bosses doesn’t count toward killcount anymore.
*Fixed blood barrage not healing and player animation
*Fixed boss kc giving kc one kill late
*Added Squid wings and Kalphite wings as cosmetic rare rewards to Squeal of Fortune
*Moved home back to old old home (fairy place)
*Disabled iron man accounts from using g.e
*Scrapped custom launcher
*Finished new client and new cache. Redownload client from any links on site and new cache will automatically download with it
*Added royal crossbow to qbd rewards
*Both brutals require boss killcount and idols now
*Added wildy level difference back
*Need combat level over 120 to open pk supply drops
*Added random spawn for pk supply drop in the locations it drops
*All cache items added/fixed and all funstuff items
*Added ::switchlooks to switch between older looking items & newer
*Changed top100arena voting to every 24 hours
*Nerfed scarlet healing too constantly
*Removed tzhaar whips 2-7. Only need to trade tzhaar whip to weapon master with tokkul and apk points to upgrade to flaming lash whip
*Added spec to frostbite weapons (50% chance to freeze enemy)
*Fixed all items not protecting during risking, items with no protect item price are default by shop price during risking
*Sigils drop from rare pk supply drops and upgraded weapons from very rare
*Added donor capes to donor shop (need required donor rank to wear)
*Added 10 minute afk timer to kick staff that aren’t there
*Recoloured Upgraded weapons to golden
*Added rest of donor capes (missing particles for some)
*Added donorzone teleport for donors (::donorzone or ::dz)
*::oldhome changed to very first apk home
*Fixed report abuse button. (do not abuse abuse button!) (saves to log and is handled by staff)
*Added 100 new Trivia questions and scrapped old ones
*Added Electro Hair & Electro Staff 1/2/3 to sof rare rewards
*Fixing boss pets walking too far behind or too large/too small

August 2015

Spoiler
*Fixed server displaying wrong current month
*Removed outdated news on login
*Fixed a ton of sloppy code & Typos
*::players now shows everyones bank wealth!
*Can use ::wealth to show wealth in chat and above players head
*Can use ::invwealth to show inventory wealth in chat and above players head (used for staking/gambling!)
*Players that have over a month played time will now also have a vet symbol in yell
*Dominion staff now doesn’t take any element runes
*Updated ::commands with new commands and changed interface
*Fixed all forum favicons and game clients icon
*Fixed ::donortitle not giving the correct title to respective rank
*Added a ::titlelist command thanks to fenrirs guide to titles
*Can now obtain rainbow partyhat in-game by merging all party hats with a golden cracker! (golden cracker obtained by using yellow dye with christmas cracker)
*Gave regular donor yell a white shadow instead of black to differ it from overlord
*Fixed players online count on website
*Overlords can now change their local chat names hex color & shad color
*Added Boss Idol to Yk’Lagor
*Fixed double vote rewards not giving two vote scrolls
*Staff can no longer use punish commands in certain areas to prevent staff abuse
*Dwarf cannon now disabled in Yk’lagor Boss room & Barrelchest Boss
*Removed bbcode from shoutbox to prevent giant videos messing up shoutbox
*Delayed shoutbox spam limit from 10 seconds to 3 seconds
*Updated ::staffcommands
*Updated interface for ::voterewards
*10 Minutes Double Rare Drops after each site players vote on & 3 hours Double Rare Drops after every 20 votes along with voterewards!
*Added name of npc killed to rare drops announcement & added rare drop logs for administrative access
*Fixed ::staffskull command icons above heads
*Fixed all customs withdrawing wrong item from bank as note
*Updated client login background!
*Added new AlternativePk Launcher to load the client through to have access to instant updates!
*Added ::equipwealth (shows nearby players your equipment worth)
*Fixed invwealth not formatting amount
*Fixed invwealth and wealth repeating in chat twice
*Added icon in yell for Sponsors (Players who have donated over $250)
*Increased forum user avatar upload size limit from 50kb to 200kb
*Hide/Show Squeal of Fortune popup icon with ::hidesof
*Added higher options for selling items
*Votes dont count from opening vote scrolls anymore, only counts when vote comes through!
*Yell is now hidden by default until starter tutorial is finished
*Added shop logs
*Changed Prestige Master to Mode Master (e.g: heroic master/ironman master) Dependent on players gamemode when hitting prestige 10
*Fixed adding friends freezing client
*Changed auto restart to every 4 hours
*Added option for trimmed completionist cape to cape stand (need 5b xp!)
*Added Wilderness Pk Supply Package every 30 minutes! Spawns in different wilderness zones. Fight others to get to the package to open it for rewards!
Common items: Guthans, Verracs, Food, Brews & Others
Rare items: Sigils, Godsword Hilts, Ring of Wealths & Others
Super Rare Items: Lava PartyCracker: Random Lava Partyhat/H’ween/ Or Santa!
*Fixed Pk Supply Package & added new rares only obtainable from pk supply package!
*Fixed vote points counter (only obtainable by opening scroll)
*Voting on weekend gives one scroll but double rewards to prevent multiple vote points on weekends!
*Added new boss with new weapon and shield
Frostbite whip - 10% chance of freezing opponent for 3-5 seconds!
Frostbite Dagger - 10% chance of freezing opponent for 3-5 seconds!
Frostbite SpiritShield - 50% chance of stopping being frozen!
Tectonic Armour (level 90 Mage armour!)
(cosmetic armour drop coming soon!)
*Removed scarlet rainbow and ring creation via item usage. Now use the weapon exchange master npc in home castle!
*Added clan wars tele to pk teles in teleporter
*Fixed Scarlet spirit shield not healing correctly (sorry just now noticed this wasn’t working right!)
*Fixed Invalid Login Server Issue
*Fixed 200m skillcapes all requiring level 99 dung
*Overlords can now use ::pnpcboss # to turn into boss pets!
*Added top 5 voters of the month on vote page!
*Changed combat level on highscores to players wealth
*Fixed completionist cape not counting pouches infused
*Added Vorago to Killcount on player management as well as rewards every 25 kills!
*Added players wealth to player management tab
*Few bug fixes & corrected rainbow model on player & some custom item inventory models
*Upgraded forums to latest version (3.4.8)
*Jadinkos now have 5% chance of dropping Whip vine (use this on abbysal whip to create an abby vine whip!)
*Removed combat wilderness level requirement to pk
*Added a new pk supply drop location

For a full list check here:
http://alternativepk.net/forums/index.php?/topic/30-updates/

Read full topic

item.title: AlternativePk 718!
item.dc:creator: @project_seek project seek
item.description:
@project_seek wrote:

to say the least, but mean the most I must say that I joined right when he released the server back in 13, of this century an it was the best decision of my life. it has been the best experience of my runescape times. over passing runescape by 2 to 2 years. each by a land slide. I hope too see anyone who joined. or joins now knowing if you just try it an you are a well experencied player or even a new player, to runescape private servers you will not be let down on this one, any other server you will have a tough time getting noticed here everyone is noticed an will have a friend. take care. daily bump will have more to say every day of course #let the fun begin

item.title: AlternativePk 718!
item.dc:creator: @pastaway pastaway
item.description:
@pastaway wrote:

[center]AlternativePk is the best 718 pking server you can find around. We’ve been online for over a year now and don’t plan on going down anytime soon! We’ve never had an economy reset and we have a very nice and moderately sized community looking to expand a bit more. There’s plenty of unique content on our server for you to enjoy!

AlternativePk - #1 718 Rsps
AlternativePk Forums
http://alternativepk.net/AlternativePkClientv1.5.jar


[spoiler=Pictures]
~Weapon Prestige Mini-Game~
AlternativePk has a uniquely custom coded MiniGame! Join weapon prestige and kill others to upgrade your weapon! The more kills you get, the better the weapon you’ll receive! The top 3 winners receive Wp Points to spend in the rewards shop used to upgrade certain weapons outside the minigame!

wtvtoz.png1072×1300

~Upgrade-able Weapons~
Use your Wp Points to upgrade the following weapons for a -20% special cost, better stats, and a better looking special!

~Upgraded Dragon claws~

~Upgraded Korasi~

~Upgraded Armadyl Godsword~

~Upgraded Bandos Godsword~

~Upgraded Saradomin Godsword~

~Upgraded Zamorak Godsword~

~Grand Exchange Fully Player Based~
Buy or sell your items on this fully functional player based Grand Exchange!

~Clan System with Ranks/Capes/Banners~
Create a clan with your friends an promote them with higher ranks depending on how you see fit. You can also buy a clan cape and motif that you can customize to your clans banner!


~Full Construction Player Owned Houses~
Create your own house and design it depending on your Construction level! All objects and floors working!

~Player Owned Shops~
Put your items up for sell in your personal shop pricing it however you like! AlternativePks uniquely custom coded player owned shops will save you time waiting for items to sell on the Grand Exchange! You can search other items or other players specific shops at the PoS npc location. Higher ranked donors have more slots! Default is 3. When your item is sold you are alerted if you’re logged in or the next time you log in!

⋆Brutal Longsword⋆
AlternativePks first custom PvM Weapon! You’ll need a certain amount of each boss kills to have access to this weapon. It’s untradeable and isn’t useable in player vs player combat. It’s special uses 100% energy and hits 5 specs, gives the overload effect and heals the player to full!

⋆Brutal Whip⋆
AlternativePks also contains the Brutal Whip! You’ll need to collect idols from bosses around the server which have a certain percentage to drop. It’s tradeable and is usable in player vs player combat. It’s special uses 100% energy and hits 4 specs and stronger than any other whip in the game!

⋆Highscores⋆
Highscores with prestige level, kills, and clan name!

2evvp5d.png1274×950

~Toolbelt~
Fully working toolbelt with storing making it easier to skill!

~Teleporter~
Easy teleportation system making it easy to find your way around the server!

14ugz1v.png744×478

[/spoiler]

Content Pics Continued:
[Spoiler=More Pics]
~Money Pouch~
Money pouch is fully functional and works correctly with all shops!

~Squeal of Fortune~
Fully working squeal of fortune with a correctly coded percentage system. Rare spins announce in yell too!

262vak6.png764×504

~Hourly Lottery~
Try AlternativePks custom lottery for your chance at a gp jackpot! The lottery announces every 15 minutes and picks a winner every hour! Entry is only 5m and you can enter up to 5 times. 10% of the pot is taken out for taxes to help keep our economy stable.

~Dwarf Cannon with Quest~
AlternativePks first quest is here! Finish the Dwarf Cannon quest for access to the Dwarf Cannon for fast range xp.

1el0n9.png764×448

~Hourly Boss Raids~
Once every hour the Party Demon Boss and a couple minions raid home. Defend home by killing him for a chance at some rare loot!

~FriendChat with Lootshare~
Friendchat fully working with loothshare working!

~Gambler~
Test your luck in other ways than the lottery with the gambler npc! Enter your option and the odds are yours!

~Bankpins~
Bankpins fully working for your accounts safety!

vy33nr.png480×622

~Monthly vote rewards + Top Voter + Vote Shop~
AlternativePks custom vote system rewards you for how much you vote monthly. Since our players support us so much we want to reward them for their support! Every month there’s new rewards to be obtained! Every 5 times a player votes they are rewarded, the more votes the better! Also the top voter of each month is rewarded a $25 donation voucher to spend in our donation shop to their liking You also receive vote points each time you vote that you can spend in AlternativePks vote shop. You also get a mystery box for voting which gives you a chance at a random pk item!

You can now also earn 10 minutes of double drops for every site you vote on!

~Killstreaks + Killstreak points + Shop~
AlternativePks custom killstreak system rewards players for killstreaks. The higher your killstreak, the better your reward! Every 5 kills announces the player and their killstreak number in global chat. Every 5 kills the player also receives a higher amount of KillStreak points they can spend in the KillStreak rewards shop which includes Drygores and AlternativePks custom Pk Master Cape!

~Summoning Pouch Creation + Scroll Creation~
Fully working pouch and scroll creation!

~Completionist Cape~
There are many requirements for the completionist cape to ensure you don’t get bored and have a goal to achieve on the server!

~AlternativePk Point System~
AlternativePk has its own point system that you can spend in the shops below. You can earn them skilling or bossing!

~Players online listing~
You can view whose online and their current gamemode/level/rank/ and wealth just by typing ::players!

~In-game Stat Viewing~
You can view anyones stats at any time by right clicking other players for the view stats option. Listed is their prestige, kills, deaths, loyalty points, combat level, hitpoints, and their skill levels!

[/spoiler]

Use multiple spins at once to use up your spins faster! (up to 1, 5, and 10 spins at once)
Extra Rewards every 25 boss kills!
Choose your own xp rate! (moderate (x100 | Heroic (x50) | Ethereal (x10) | IronMan (x50 & No trading/Shops)
Mage/Range & Melee Tokhaar-kal capes!
Boss pets!

~Wilderness Sunfreet~
Teleport to Sunfreet in the wilderness for chance at Drygores and bonus killstreak points! Beware though because anyone can catch you off gaurd at any time and kill you while you’re distracted. Sunfreet also gaurds the crystal key chest so defeat Sunfreet before you can get your reward!

~(NEW VORAGO!)~
